title: U.S. population share by generation 2018
summary: This statistic presents the U.S. population share by in U.S. as of 2018 , based on share volume .
During the survey period , it was found that The_Greatest_Generation_(born_before_1928) accounted for 0.64 % of all share app .
Local p2p tv app The_Silent_Generation_(born_1928-1945) was ranked second with a 7.47 % share Population .
gold: The statistic depicts the distribution of the U.S. population in 2018 , by generation . In that year , Millennials made up about 22 percent of the population in the United States .
